about_the_game:
You are the only warden of this prison! But there are five cells, and the prisoners are constantly trying to escape.

The red circle represents your gaze. Move it with the arrow keys to warn prisoners and prevent their escape.
As time passes, the prisoners' escape gauge fills up. If you lose focus, the prison may be empty before you know it.
A time management surveillance game that tests your quick thinking and reflexes!

How many prisoners can you keep under watch?

A time management surveillance game that tests your quick thinking and reflexes!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia gt1030
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek

short_description: Control your gaze with the arrow keys and stop the cute prisoners from escaping! A surveillance action game that requires quick decision-making and full concentration!
